user_review: This is a fairly new place having only opened in June or July of last year. I had the oxtail plate and my son had the jerk chicken. Both were served with rice & beans, plantain and veg. I highly recommend that you stop in to see Claudella if you're in town. She is as charming as her food is delicious!We will definitely be back again.

I came to visit Montreal from the US and stumbled upon 6 Green Banana with a friend. I had the vegetarian roti and my friend had the jerk chicken. Honestly, it was the best vegetarian roti I've had in a while. Please make sure to visit when you're in the area! I'll sure be back when I come back to Montreal.
